titles: By the vice-chancellour and heads of houses whereas by the rude carriage of severall schollars in this university ... severall tumultuous disorders have been lately committed ... / signed in the name, and by the consent of the heads of houses, by Dan. Greenwood, vice-can.
author: University of Oxford.
Greenwood, Daniel.
publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,
notes: Other title information from first lines of text.
